title: New: Local Natives – Heavy Feet
body: Performed on [KCRW](http://www.thelineofbestfit.com/new-music/blog/watch-local-natives-perform-new-song-heavy-feet-115313), new track _Heavy Feet_, from **Local Natives** now has a studio version available to hear. Having never been a particularly big fan of their previous material, I’ve been shocked by just how much I’ve enjoyed their rebranded epic-indie-pop. So it’ll probably find it’s way onto daytime radio, and most likely, the summer festival circuit, but at this moment in time, there’s few other bands I’d want to see blasting out anthems to a field full of merry festival-goers. Check out _Heavy Feet_ below.
